scripts.watch: npm run-script cleanup & npm run-script watch-ui & npm run-script watch-bg
scripts.compile: npm run-script cleanup && npm run-script minify-ui && npm run-script minify-bg
scripts.compile-clean: npm run-script cleanup && npm run-script minify-ui-clean && npm run-script minify-bg
scripts.cleanup: rm -Rf ./fonts & rm -Rf ./js && mkdir fonts && mkdir js && cp ./node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/* ./fonts/
scripts.package: rm ./package.zip & npm run-script compile-clean && zip -r ./package.zip js/ css/ images/ svg/ icons/ fonts/ manifest.json window.html
